definition.value: Contain action definition which describes an activity to be performed.

comment.value: This version of the profile requires url where the library of planDefinitions are stored.
This version of the profile requires at least one identifier.
This version of the profile requires specifying the version of this PlanDefinition.
This version of the profile requires the name of the planDefinition
This version of the profile requires a title which is used in an UI.

requirements.value: This version of the profile requires an effectivePeriod of period.start when the PlanDefinition status value is active
This version of the profile requires a date for when the PlanDefinition was last changed
Helps establish the "authority/credibility" of the plan definition. May also allow for contact. This version of the profile requires the name of the PlanDefinition publisher.
This version of the profile requires a description of the PlanDefinition.

comment.value: If specified, this is usually after the approval date. This version of the profile requires a date when the PlanDefinition was last reviewed.

requirements.value: This version of the profile requires an effectivePeriod of period.start when the PlanDefinition status value is active

Assist in searching for appropriate content. This version of the profile requires a useContext which is used to discover planDefinitions of similar useContext. Will be used to drive searches related to the patientâ€™s condition.
This version of the profile requires the concept the PlanDefinition.goal addresses
This version of the profile requires action (activityDefinitions).
This version of the profile requires a title of the action (activityDefinitions).
This version of the profile requires a description of the action (activityDefinitions).
